Posts.Content: Mommy23boys wrote: Had an excisional biopsy on the "debris" like mass last Wednesday. ( Doctor said that results would be back by Friday or Monday.  Didn't come back on Friday - and the whole Mid-atlantic region is in state of emergency so looks like I won't hear anything tomorrow.  My poor husband and sons will just have to put up with me as a basket case until after the Frankenstorm passes.  Sadly enough - I am too distracted/anxious to even care about this massive storm.  My husband on the other hand is madly consumed by the storm and finding my anxiety slightly irritating.    This waiting is a kind of torture.  So, the torture will continue.  Just complaining -  - - Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Damn Frankenstorm . . . Mommy23boys organa
